verses.verse: A song of ascents. Of David. [b]I rejoiced when they said to me, “Let us go to the house of the LORD.”
And finally our feet are standing at your gates, O Jerusalem.
Jerusalem is built as a city that is firmly bound together[c] in unity.
There the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, as it was decreed for Israel to celebrate the name of the LORD.[d]
For there the thrones of judgment[e] were established, the thrones of the house of David.
Pray for the peace[f] of Jerusalem: “May those who love you rest secure.
May there be peace within your walls and security in your palaces.”
[g]Out of love for my relatives and friends, I will say, “May peace be within you.”
Out of love for the house of the LORD, our God, I will pray for your well-being.
